about_the_game:
There’s no other way!
The astral plane becomes his only waking reality.
Forced to live a nightmare cunningly orchestrated by BIO, an organization driven by the so-called greater good but at what cost?
Hiding its practices under a suit of normalcy.
Struggling, you play as Dr Howard, who leaves all certainty behind in a deadly quest to find the secrets hidden in the depths of the astral plane and to save humanity.

Unknowing of what’s yet to come, the horrors of reality dawn on him as he finds fragmented memories and uncovers truths about Allie and Leilah that have been  hidden for years. Dr. Howard floats effortlessly in the vast expanse of the astral plane.
Leaving him with the sensation of weightlessness that is both liberating and unnerving. Here, in this place is where the laws of physics hold no sway.

The Grab System: Your Lifeline.

The astral plane is another dimension. Reach into the void and pull yourself through the chaos, each grasp clawing you closer to the unknown. Every movement is a gamble: precision and resolve are the only things keeping you from drifting into the abyss.

Propulsion Gloves: Defy the Current.

With advanced propulsion gloves, you can fight back harder. Surge forward with bursts of speed, slicing through hostile currents in a desperate race against time. Your tools are your lifeline, but mastery of them is the difference between survival and annihilation.

Astral Gems: Hunt for the truth. 

Allie’s memories are not freely given. Scattered across its vast expanse are astral shards—glowing fragments of forgotten memories. These radiant shards pulse with eerie light, each one a key to unlocking the truth. But the shards are guarded, hidden in the plane’s most treacherous reaches. Dare to seek them out, and brace for what watches from the shadows.

Astral Projectors: Unleash the Power.

The astral shards serve a greater purpose. Machines known as astral projectors lie dormant, waiting for the shards to awaken them. When activated, these towering devices explode with light, carving through the void to reveal fragmented visions. These haunting glimpses of a forgotten past are your guide. But beware—some memories are better left buried.

name: Astral Hound VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Oculus Rift, PICO 4, Steam Index, HTC Vive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-11800 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070 equivalent or greater
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest, Oculus Rift, PICO 4, Steam Index, HTC Vive

short_description: Become The Astral Hound, play as Howard, a man who can project himself into the astral plane, as he traverses the Astral Realm to find and rescue Allie who has been kidnapped by a supernatural organization BIO.
